name: Fade
description: A clean fade cut that gradually tapers from short to skin, providing a sharp, fresh look.

name: Taper
description: A subtle taper that blends the hair on the sides and back with the natural hairline for a clean finish.

name: Lining
description: Crisp, precise lining that sharpens up your hairline and enhances your overall look.

name: Da Bears Special
description: The ultimate taper and beard combo for a smooth blend with a full beard trim.

name: Kids Cut
description: A kid-friendly haircut designed to keep them looking fresh and stylish, perfect for any occasion.

name: Braids
description: Professional braiding for a bold style. From cornrows to intricate patterns, get a look that lasts.

name: Mohawk/Sponge High Top
description: A modern high-top style with sponge curls or a classic mohawk for an edgy, eye-catching look.

name: Beard Trim
description: A precision beard trim to shape and clean up your facial hair, giving you a sharp, finished appearance.
